channel.title: The story of education
channel.description:
This series presents various excerpts from the book, "The Story of Education," which traces the evolution of education. The excerpts are read by the book's co-author, Dr. Carroll Atkinson.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Hebraic education
item.description: This program focuses on Hebraic education and its influence on modern education.
item.dc:creator: KOAC (Radio/television station : Corvallis, Or.)
item.dc:subject: Speeches, addresses, etc
